headline: Edison International (EIX): One-Off Gain Drives Profit Margin, Challenging Bullish Narratives
summary: Edison International (EIX) reported net profit margins of 16.3%, more than double last year’s 7.6%, with EPS growth of 123.2% over the past year far surpassing its 5-year average of 32.6% per year. While profits have grown at an impressive 32.6% annual rate over five years, this year’s results received a boost from a non-recurring $679 million gain. Despite the strong bottom line, market expectations for future performance are muted, as earnings are forecast to decline and revenue growth is...
